solution_line_template: If Class B has {class_b_size} people Class A has {class_b_size} * {class_a_multiplier} = <<{class_b_size}*{class_a_multiplier}={class_a_size}>>{class_a_size} people
Thus the size of Class C is {class_c_multiplier} * {class_a_size} = <<{class_c_multiplier}*{class_a_size}={class_c_size}>>{class_c_size} people
